name: Abyssal (humboldt123)
description:
Make your way through the Abyss to fight the Orb Mage!

The four hearts orbiting the player is their health. If you take damage you lose one of the hearts - lose all four and its game over. You can dash into the Orb Mage to deal damage to them.

Controls:
Move - Arrow Keys
Jump - X
Dash - Z
